text:
Hey content friends! I’m hosting a panel next week on *<https://knotch.zoom.us/webinar/register/2816443305762/WN_V7EwY0-oRgKvB5sOfrUb3Q|content framework strategy>* with SVP of Strategy David Brown (Knotch), VP of Content Amanda Curtin (Synchrony) and Director of Content Strategy Kendra Walters (SAP Concur). I’m pasting our starter questions below - but we’ll also take live Q&A. I know this conversation comes up a lot in this community.

• What is the right structure for a content framework strategy? 
    ◦ What questions are you trying to answer by implementing a framework, such as business objectives, audience needs, or competitive environments?
• Who should be involved in its development/agreement?
• How do you integrate content strategy with brand strategy? With channels?
• What is the most important part of the strategy? The most over-rated? 
• How do you focus a strategy when opportunities come easily? If a team gets easily distracted by shiny objects?

elements.text: Hey content friends! I’m hosting a panel next week on
content framework strategy

with SVP of Strategy David Brown (Knotch), VP of Content Amanda Curtin (Synchrony) and Director of Content Strategy Kendra Walters (SAP Concur). I’m pasting our starter questions below - but we’ll also take live Q&A. I know this conversation comes up a lot in this community.
What is the right structure for a content framework strategy?
What questions are you trying to answer by implementing a framework, such as business objectives, audience needs, or competitive environments?
Who should be involved in its development/agreement?
How do you integrate content strategy with brand strategy? With channels?
What is the most important part of the strategy? The most over-rated?
How do you focus a strategy when opportunities come easily? If a team gets easily distracted by shiny objects?

text:
I noticed a few link-builders appearing in here asking for any old link.

While this isn't the place do to it, it's also important to get the right kind of links.

:x:  Not all links are equal - guest posts, earned, or paid.

<https://twitter.com/DomKent/status/1491071898087669762?s=20&t=Op4qa50BY3VBvvvxxXabag>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/DomKent|@DomKent>: How do I get more backlinks to my content?

This is probably the question I get asked the most on webinars and podcasts.

Here are 6 ways to get good backlinks and 5 attributes to bear in mind.

text: Hey there! Dani here, Content Lead at ConvertKit. How much did creators earn on average in 2021? How common was creator burnout last year? What tools are most used in the creator tool stack? We're trying to find out these answers and more. Want to help us define what being a “creator” really is? Fill out this 15-20 minute survey to be a part of ConvertKit’s 2022 State of the Creator Economy Report <https://convertkit.typeform.com/to/Bn8Sxa4i>

Fill out this 15-20 minute survey to be a part of ConvertKit’s 2022 State of the Creator Economy Report

text:
Hey all! I'm Laura, the content lead at Guidant, an American small business finance company. Every year we survey thousands of small businesses for our Small Business Trends Report.

Former, future, or current small business owner? Give us the details! If you’re US-based, your 10 minutes of help could *win you a $500 Amazon gift card*.

<https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/sbt-sweepstakes|Take our Small Business Trends Survey before it closes tonight at 12:00 AM EST!>

attachments.text: We talk to small businesses all over America to map the way for aspiring business owners. Contribute today!
attachments.title: Guidant 2022 Small Business Trends

text:
Hey, people!
I'm working on a round-up post for a website with mostly US traffic; DR81; It's not just a blog but a real business with a blog. 

Topic: "SEO Tips for 2022"

Requirements & Details:
-1 Actionable and Clear SEO Tip;
*-Confirm with me what your tip will be about; we don't want any duplication.*
-150 words contribution
-50 words author bio for each contributor
[1 link to the home page within the bio]
*-Let me know what you offer in return right off the bat. Yeah, I want a link back to my own website.*
-Deadline: 10th of Feb; Thursday

DM me.
